description:
This course is about SWOT Analysis. Together we will go through every aspect of this fundamental business analysis tool. We will learn why SWOT analysis is so important for any business, how to conduct it and when. We will go through each category in detail: Strenghts, Weaknesses, Opportunities and Threats. 

This course can be taken by both absolute beginners and skilled professionals. All specific terminology used in the course is thoroughly explained and repeated several times. This course follows a logical pattern of going from a broad perspective of the general idea behind SWOT analysis to specific rules and tips. This course also features case studies help you practice all the theoretical knowledge you have received.

There isn't any unnecessary information in the course, letting you complete it in under an hour. This course is perfect to learn SWOT analysis or refresh your memory on any particular topic about it.
title: Understand SWOT Analysis in 30 minutes
